mainSequence.step: Community_novice gets list of proposals from forum
Community_novice provides positive/negative feedback on forum proposal
Alice_novice submits treasury role proposal to bitdaogovernance
TokenHolders_novice vote on treasury role proposal
BitDAOAdmins_expert gets result of Alice's proposal
BitDAOTreasury transfers funds to grants treasury
Alice_novice receives transfer confirmation from grants treasury
